meanings.definition: A larval form of a parasitic worm found in the blood of vertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The microfilaria was detected in the blood sample under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian identified the microfilaria in the dog's blood test.
meanings.sent3: The tiny microfilaria decided to throw a party in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent4: The microfilaria swam gracefully through the blood like a tiny dancer.
meanings.sent5: The presence of microfilaria in the blood indicated a parasitic infection.

meanings.definition: The larval stage of a filarial worm.
meanings.sent1: Researchers studied the microfilaria to understand the life cycle of the worm.
meanings.sent2: The microfilaria eventually develops into an adult filarial worm.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous microfilaria played hide-and-seek inside the worm.
meanings.sent4: The journey from microfilaria to adult worm is like a caterpillar becoming a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The tiny microfilaria wriggled its way through the worm's body.
